name: Kepler Attack for Watch
description:
Top 5 Casual Game in the US!

Kepler Attack is an arcade game for your iPhone and Apple Watch. Fly through space and destroy waves of alien space invaders from Kepler-452b.

“I’m just amazed that this is on my Watch.” - Tom, host of The Apple WatchCast Podcast - http://www.applewatchcast.com

“I think this is actually my personal favorite new game now on the Apple Watch because of its really fast pacing which is perfect for these types of games.” - HotshotTek, 10 Awesome Apple Watch Games Apps of 2019

• Beautiful retro arcade graphics!
• Fast paced alien attack waves with a variety of enemy space invaders!
• Power-ups include Shield, Triple Shot, Rapid Fire and Smart Bomb!
• Intuitive and simple controls using the Crown on the Watch!
• Swipe to move on the iPhone!
• Short burst gameplay is perfect for the Watch and iPhone!
• Daily rank to see how you compare to the rest of the world!
• Retro sound effects on the iPhone!
• Play anywhere, anytime!
• Runs at 60fps on the Watch!

Relive the glory days of the arcade on your Apple Watch and iPhone.

Background Story
I made this space shooting game where you get to battle space intruders from Kepler-452b because of my love of classic retro arcade games from the eighties. The idea of a galaxy under attack from alien invaders and you, a lone space pilot with an advanced space ship is like a plot out of a sci-fi movie. 

Protecting the galaxy from swarms of aliens was a staple of arcade space shooters, and I hope I have recreated that experience for you on both the iPhone and Apple Watch! Have fun piloting your space ship, blowing up swarms of alien enemies - and don't forget to avoid those asteroids!

Thanks for playing
-Johnno
